snippet: American Express is set to announce a new sponsorship program and prepaid debit card that take aim at the millions of people who play the online video game League of Legends.
abstract: Tanzina Vega Advertising column; American Express is set to announce sponsorship program and prepaid debit card linked to Riot Games' popular online video game League of Legends; becoming part of digital game experience is effort to get the attention of millennial generation.
lead_paragraph: American Express is set to announce a new sponsorship program and prepaid debit card that take aim at the millions of people who play the online video game League of Legends.

headline.main: AmEx Links a Debit Card to an Online Video Game
headline.print_headline: AmEx Links a Debit Card to an Online Video Game
